column4: Welcome, you are now talking to an AI doctor. As I am part of a scientific experiment, I would appreciate it if you could take the time to answer a super short questionnaire at the end of the interview. Tap Speak to ask your question and then tap Send to submit it to me.
I'm sorry, I only answer medically relevant questions. How can I help you today?
what does car what does cancer causes

Unfortunately, the exact causes of cancer are still unknown. In general, though, cancer is caused by changes in the DNA of healthy cells, which can be caused by environmental or hereditary factors. Some known risk factors include smoking, exposure to the sun, lifestyle habits, a family history of cancer, and a history of certain diseases, among many others.

Stroke is a medical emergency that requires immediate attention. Symptoms of a stroke include sudden weakness, numbness, or paralysis of the face, arm or leg, especially on one side of the body, difficulty speaking or understanding language, confusion, difficulty walking, dizziness, loss of balance, vision problems, and a sudden severe headache with no known cause. If you have any of these symptoms, please seek medical help immediately.

Strokes are caused by a disruption in the blood supply to the brain. This can result from a blocked artery, caused by a blood clot or from a burst in a weakened blood vessel. Other possible causes include high blood pressure, blocked carotid or vertebral arteries, diabetes, heart disease, certain hereditary conditions, smoking, and alcohol use.
